title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Airbus A310 - EFB Flex Temp and V1, Vr and V2
description:
In this video we will have a look how to calculate the flex temp and the v1, vr and v2 speeds using the electronic flight bag (EFB) included in the Airbus A310 which is part of the 40th anniversary edition of MSFS. The values are critical to calculate because you will need them once you are ready to program the MCDU.
